game.name: Shadow Breakers
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Captions available, Partial Controller Support, Stats, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Play as Ultra, Apola, and Mozez as they battle shadow demons unleashed by the Cursed, a group seeking to restore balance through chaos. With their robot companions, they must split up to stop the demons and thwart the Cursed’s sinister plans.
